summary: HI I HAVE AN ISSUE WITH THE BRAKES THE TRUCK HAS ABOUT 75000 MILES ON 2003 DODGE DAKOTA SXT  A SAFETY ISSUE   I WENT ON THE SUNDAY 6/21/2015  FOR A BOAT RIDE THE ON THE WAY HOME DRIVING ON THE FREEWAY I-94 AND  IT HAPPEND  WHEN I GOT OFF ON THE EXIT TRYID TO APPLY BRAKES DIDNT HAVE ANYTHING ON THE REAR METAL  LINE HAD BURST  I WAS TRAVELING ABOUT  SPEED OF  APROX 55 MPH  SO ITS ALLWAYS SAFE TO NOT TOW ANYTHING WITH A FAST SPEED  YUST TO BE SAFE  BUT I DO RESPECT THE TRUCK EVERYTIME I TOW  A BOAT  SO PLEASE I NEED HELP ON THIS  WITH A 75000 MILES ON BRAKES TO FAIL NOT GOOD  I THINK  CHRYSLER SHOULD RESPOND   TO THIS ISSUE  AND SAFETY  RECALL  12 YEAR OLD TRUCK SHOULD NOT HAVE A BRAKE FAIL  MY TRUCK SILL NOT FIXT GOT AN ESTIMATE  ITS LITLE OVE $670 DOLL CHRYSLER  CORP I THINK IS  CHARGE FOR THIS TYPE OF  BRAKE SYSTEM AND SAFETY ISSUE
